title: About Me
text:
Professional Headshot


Business Analytics Student | Software Engineer | Entrepreneur


Fourth-year Business Analytics student at the National University of Singapore with demonstrated experience in software engineering, data analysis, and business intelligence. Recipient of the prestigious IMDA SG Digital Scholarship and NUS Merit Scholarship.
Passionate about leveraging technology to solve complex business problems, with expertise in cloud computing, full-stack development, and data-driven decision making.



National University of Singapore
Bachelor of Science in Business Analytics
August 2022 - Present

GPA: 4.56/5.0 (Summa Cum Laude standing)
Awards: IMDA SG Digital Scholarship (2024), NUS Merit Scholarship (2022)
Relevant Coursework:

Data Structures and Algorithms (A+)
Information Technologies in Finance (A)
Computational Methods for Business Analytics (A)
Programming Methodology (A-)









Programming: Python, Java, JavaScript, SQL, R
Cloud & DevOps: AWS (S3, EC2, Lambda, RDS), Terraform, Firebase
Web Development: MERN Stack, Vue.js, Express.js, React
Data Tools: Power BI, Tableau, Google Analytics, RStudio
Other: Git, Trello, Notion, Slack






Automated cloud infrastructure deployment at GovTech, improving efficiency by 30%
Developed financial management platform SmarTrack using Vue.js and Firebase
Founded ATA Sports e-commerce business generating $3,500 monthly profit
Optimized marketing campaigns at Vantage Markets, increasing performance by 15%

Download Full Resume
